sentences.english: The town of Xenia didn't even have a warning siren.
sentences.chinese: 而齊妮亞鎮甚至沒有警報器。

sentences.english: Yahoo Shopping is the best place to comparison shop de, director of small piezoelectric alarms.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎購物是最好的地方比較小商店棣導演壓電警報器。

sentences.english: Then the fire alarm went off. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 當時火險警報器響了，我一把抓起衣服就往外跑。

sentences.english: The USFA compiled state-by-state residential guidelines for smoke alarms.
sentences.chinese: 美國聯邦消防署編撰每州對住宅煙霧警報器的準則。

sentences.english: The siren wailed piercingly in the cold morning air.
sentences.chinese: 警報器在早晨的冷空氣裏尖厲地呼嘯著。

sentences.english: Some models have locks or even alarms.
sentences.chinese: 有些裝置還配有門鎖甚至警報器。

sentences.english: Urinary bed alarms are generally regarded as the most effective bedwetting treatment for the long term.
sentences.chinese: 尿牀警報器通過被視爲最有效的治療長期尿牀的手段。

sentences.english: Campana slammed on the train's brake and blasted his air horn.
sentences.chinese: 坎帕納猛地扳動火車剎車，拉響了警報器。

sentences.english: As the robber was rewriting the note the teller activated a silent alarm.
sentences.chinese: 就在劫匪拿回去重寫時，櫃員拉響了無聲警報器。

sentences.english: I’m so mean I’ve got a burglar alarm on my dustbin.
sentences.chinese: 我非常吝嗇，在我家垃圾箱裏安裝了個盜匪警報器。

sentences.english: Then the fire alarm ____ ___. I just grabbed my clothes and ran out.
sentences.chinese: 當時火險警報器響了，我一把抓起衣服就往外跑。

sentences.english: Ambulance sirens were heard in many parts of Phnom Penh soon after the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生後，金邊多處都可聽到警報器的哀鳴聲。

sentences.english: Gregory Burkhart hushed his tour group into silence as an alarm buzzer sounded.
sentences.chinese: 警報器發出聲音時，伯克哈特叫參觀團安靜下來。

sentences.english: Honey , is that noise an alarm from next door?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，那噪音是從隔壁傳來的警報器聲嗎？

sentences.english: Does your house have a burglar alarm?
sentences.chinese: 你家裝自動防盜警報器了嗎？

sentences.english: Fortunately, the buzzer of my homemade burglar alarm woke me up.
sentences.chinese: 那是深夜，幸好我自制的警報器把我吵醒了。

definition: Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
window with an iron grating (apartment etc)/barred window of a prison cell
out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
